Singapore: The Mongol court sends a mission to obtain elephants from Long Ya Men (or Dragon's Tooth Strait), believed to be Bedok Tanah Merah Ferry Terminal area or east of today's Keppel Harbour owned by Lee Kuan Yew's son through inheritance.
Poland: Coronation of Władysław I the Elbow-high
Peru: Mayta Cápac was succeeded by his son Cápac Yupanqui.
China: Ayurbarwada's son Gegeen Khan became emperor of the Yuan dynasty.
